channel.title: Let's play Black Mesa
channel.description:
Hey guys
I started a Let's play of Black Mesa, check it out I tried to not be annoying like other commentators.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ClUj9bHdLqc[/url]
Let me know what you think.
: )

item.title: Let's play Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: _Trivia
item.description:
Jokerine:

What’s wrong with the subtitles?

About the italian ones:

They are pretty good, except that sometimes they’re badly written with gross typo error or simply badly traducted.

The worst thing imho is that sometimes(too often ), the subs misses at all: for example in the chapter “Forget about Freeman”, the HECU radio-speaker who announces the retreat of the military forces from the base is not subtitled(and this is an important talking for the game plot!).

Read full topic

item.title: Let's play Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Vinci
item.description:
I tried Black masa now! Apart from the translation of subtitles in Italian (my language) that constitute the only flaw, the game is a masterpiece, well done. It 'worthy to be regarded as falling within the saga of HL. They are funny gags in the game, as the alarm button where there is a guard or the guy in the bathroom asking for toilet paper. xD I also noticed the puzzles in the game, very interesting. I just started playing and are still in the early chapters (the part when you get off the elevator where headcrab you jump on), then I still can not make a judgment “final” and so far I have not found bug. Anyway congratulations to the developers of Black mesa and all those who worked on it. And I hope that there will be updates as soon as possible and that it be placed subtitle translation (by translators, of course). Also expect the release of the full version.

Sorry if my English is not good, is translated with google translate. xD

Read full topic
